Nourish your body

I'm sure you've heard it time and time again, "drink more water", "watch what you eat". Cliche's are cliche's for a reason! They usually hold some truth to them.

frontmatter.title: 5 Healthy Developer Habits
frontmatter.content: Terrance Corley shares 5 of his healthy habits that have allowed him to be a more happy and efficient developer.
